name: Yuying Mansion
description: The story of players and their peers' Wanxiang 'cohabiting, playing Tetris together. Players can use "WASD" to move around and move blocks, close to the "..." icon in front of the NPC, and press "F" to engage in dialogue and start the block game. In the game, players can change the clothes of NPCs. After changing the clothes, NPCs will reveal their private parts.
